name: 2albidv
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2
body: |- wi(w0, wb(wal(s0, wal(s1, w1)), wal(s0, wal(s1, w2))))

stmt.origin: albidv(s0, w0, wal(s1, w1), wal(s1, w2))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wal(s0, wal(s1, w1)), wal(s0, wal(s1, w2))))
-| wi(w0, wb(wal(s1, w1), wal(s1, w2)))
-| diffsw(s0, w0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wal(s0, wal(s1, w1)), wal(s0, wal(s1, w2))))
-| wi(w0, wb(wal(s1, w1), wal(s1, w2)))
-| diffsw(s0, w0)

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wal(s1, w1), wal(s1, w2)))
-| wi(w0, wb(w1, w2))
-| diffsw(s1, w0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wal(s0, wal(s1, w1)), wal(s0, wal(s1, w2))))
-| diffsw(s0, w0)
-| wi(w0, wb(w1, w2))
-| diffsw(s1, w0)

comment: Formula-building rule for two universal quantifiers (deduction form). (Contributed by NM, 4-Mar-1997.)
